pullRequest.title: [2.19.x] DDF-UI-184 G-4697 removal of old/invalid 3-D map geometries
pullRequest.bodyText:
What does this PR do?
This PR does two things:

Fixes the keyword issue, where geometries remained drawn on the map even after searching a new keyword.
If the user causes a currently valid geometry to be invalid (e.g., deleting a value), that geometry is now removed from the map.

Who is reviewing it?

@hayleynorton @zta6 @andrewzimmer
Select relevant component teams:

@codice/ui
Ask 2 committers to review/merge the PR and tag them here.

How should this be tested?

Testing keyword:

Open an anyGeo search and select keyword
Search for a region
See that the geo for that region pops up
Search another region in the same anyGeo Keyword search
See the new region pop up and the old one go away

Testing invalid geos:

Open an anyGeo search and select one of the geometries
Draw the geo and notice the drawn geo displays on the map
Delete part of the input for the geo to make it invalid
Verify that the geo disappears from the map
Do this for all geometries (Line, Polygon, Bounding Box, Point Radius, and Keyword

Any background context you want to provide?
What are the relevant tickets?
Fixes: codice/ddf-ui#184
Screenshots

Checklist:

 Documentation Updated
 Update / Add Threat Dragon models
 Update / Add Unit Tests
 Update / Add Integration Tests

Notes on Review Process
Please see Notes on Review Process for further guidance on requirements for merging and abbreviated reviews.
Review Comment Legend:

✏️ (Pencil) This comment is a nitpick or style suggestion, no action required for approval. This comment should provide a suggestion either as an in line code snippet or a gist.
❓ (Question Mark) This comment is to gain a clearer understanding of design or code choices, clarification is required but action may not be necessary for approval.
❗ (Exclamation Mark) This comment is critical and requires clarification or action before approval.

commit.message: DDF-UI-184 G-4697 fix the trigger for keyword poly display
DDF-UI-184 remove invalid bounding boxes from 3D map
DDF-UI-184 G-4697 add render requests for invalid geos
